title: 2D Field Of View Lighting
author: J Riley Harrington
description: Casting light and shadows that play off of the environment can be a trick but if done well can add alot to a game! In The Pit, light plays an extremely imporant role not only in the game's asthetics but game play as well. Here is a first look at how we handled 2 dimensional lighting by writing 2D field of view.

title: The Second Post I've Made
author: J Riley Harrington
description: An enthralling sequel of blogging ang posts
